short_summary: Request for Local Access Service (LAS) from Shared Services Canada (SSC), deadline December 27, 2022.
description: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for Local Access Service (LAS) in Manitoba
full_summary:
Notice of Public Tender for Local Access Service in Manitoba (Canada)

**Request for Proposal Reference Number:** PW-22-01017077 **Request for Proposal Solicitation Number:** R000130643 **Project Overview:** Shared Services Canada (SSC) issues a formal Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Local Access Service (LAS) to the Government of Canada with offices located within Manitoba, Canada. This RFP is issued in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the Request for Proposal document. **Key Requirements:** * Provision of Local Access Service to approximately 8,000 existing LAS lines, with a plan to migrate these lines to wireless and Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP) solutions within a period of several years. * Maintenance and updating of all infrastructure associated with delivering the service to ensure consistent service level agreements. * Compliance with the required dialing plan, Classes of Service, and line features. * Provision of a substitute service, if required, to ensure continuous service until the alternate solution is implemented. **Selection Criteria:** To participate in this RFP, suppliers must meet the following minimum essential requirements: * A minimum of 10 years of experience in delivering complex feature-rich local access services to large-scale customers with multiple locations within the last 15 years. * At least 5 years of experience delivering local access services within the last 10 years for the specific geographic areas of Manitoba. * A minimum of 5 years of experience in supporting at least 50% of the volume of total approximate local access lines across the applicable geographic region. **Bid Submission:** Interested suppliers must submit a Statement of Capabilities in writing to the contact person identified below on or before the closing date of December 27, 2022. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements. **Contact Information:** - Name: Jean-Charles St-Onge - Title: Procurement Team Leader - Email: Jean-Charles.St-Onge@ssc-spc.gc.ca - Telephone: (613)-618-0167 Note: This notice is not a request for tenders and no bids should be submitted. This is simply a notice or an intention by SSC to award a contract to a pre-identified supplier, with the option for other suppliers to submit a statement of capabilities to participate in the procurement process. If no supplier submits a statement of capabilities that meets the specified requirements, a contract will be awarded to the pre-selected supplier. Format Requirements
